message: Let's start with a fair split, and we can reassess as we go along.
A fair split is a good start, but I think I can do better. Your turn to counter!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. Your turn to counter!
I'm not willing to give up that much. I think I can do better. Your turn to counter again!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal. Don't expect me to go any lower!
I'm not getting desperate yet, but I'm willing to make a slightly better offer. Let's see if you'll take it!
I'm getting close to desperation, but I'm still holding out for a better deal. Don't think you can get away with this easy!
I'm not going to give in yet. I think I can do better than this. Let's see if you'll meet me in the middle!
I'm running out of options, but I'm not ready to give in yet. I'll give you one more chance to make a better offer.
I'm not going to give up now. I think I can get a better deal than this. Let's see if you'll meet me at the 50/50 mark!
